snippet.title: Selene's Unbearable Night - Indie third person survival horror [Gameplay Trailer]
snippet.description:
Dowload the game 

Itch.io: 
https://farelas.itch.io/selenes-unbearable-night

Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2503690/Selenes_Unbearable_Night/ 

Learn about Selene's story: A woman who is kidnapped and her only goal is to survive, but she soon realizes that there is a much darker secret than she could have imagined.

On her way, Selene will meet people who will help her face this situation, however, others will be in charge of getting in her way.

Narrative Story: Learn the story of the characters of Selene's Unbearable Night through dialogues and cinematics; With two playable characters you will be able to discover in depth the reasons and motives behind all this.

Free combat: Choose your way of fighting; Whether it's with your trusty knife, firearms or stealth, you'll be able to finish off different types of enemies; use the environment to your advantage and dominate the fight, with moves like dodge and parry.

Resource management: Take care of your resources, since these are scarce; collect key objects in order to discover Selene´s story.

Puzzle Solving: Pay attention to the environment, investigate and collect items to solve puzzles.

If you want Selene's story to continue, the only way to do it is with the support of the community so that this can grow and be completed.

The game is still in a early stage of development. This is only the first chapter of two that the game will have, but thanks to the good reception that the first version had, I decided to expand the story of Selene, in the hope of turning this project into a full game with the help of the community.

If you liked “Project Selene” I invite you to take a look at my other game that I am currently working on, since it is a similar experience: 

UNBEARABLE: https://farelas.itch.io/unbearable
